title: What We've Learnt From 30 AI-Enabled One-Day Sprints | Torchbox

metadata.description: Discover the power and potential of one-day sprints in the era of rapid technological advancement. Learn from our experiments with GPT-4 and how a human-centric approach paired with AI fosters innovation.
